plot: Sniffer the dog spies a bone that has just been tossed into the garbage from a restaurant but, before he can get it for himself, a garbage truck comes along and the driver dumps the bone ...
title: The Bone Ranger
plot_es: Sniffer the dog spies a bone that has just been tossed into the garbage from a restaurant but, before he can get it for himself, a garbage truck comes along and the driver dumps the bone ...
